environments.name: Dev BER

inputs.script:
az login --service-principal --username $(servicePrincipal) --password $(clientSecret) --tenant $(tenatId) --output $(output)
az account set --subscription $(subscriptionid)

$appServiceName = az webapp list --resource-group $(commonResourceGroupName) --query [].name --output tsv
Write-Output "##vso[task.setvariable variable=appServiceName]$appServiceName"

inputs.InlineScript: :: You can provide your deployment commands here. One command per line.

environments.triggerReason: After successful deployment of Dev Common Infra

environments.name: Dev Web Service

inputs.script:
az login --service-principal --username $(servicePrincipal) --password $(clientSecret) --tenant $(tenatId) --output $(output)
az account set --subscription $(subscriptionid)

$webSiteName= az webapp list --resource-group $(resourceGroupName) --query [].name --output tsv
Write-Output "##vso[task.setvariable variable=webSiteName]$webSiteName"

inputs.InlineScript: :: You can provide your deployment commands here. One command per line.

environments.triggerReason: After successful deployment of Dev Infra

environments.name: Dev Database

inputs.script:
az login --service-principal --username $(servicePrincipal) --password $(clientSecret) --tenant $(tenatId) --output $(output)
az account set --subscription $(subscriptionid)

$servername= az sql server list --resource-group $(resourceGroupName) --query [].name --output tsv
Write-Output "##vso[task.setvariable variable=servername]$servername"

environments.triggerReason: After successful deployment of Dev Infra

environments.name: Dev K8s

inputs.script:
az login --service-principal --username $(servicePrincipal) --password $(clientSecret) --tenant $(tenatId) --output $(output)
az account set --subscription $(subscriptionid)

$repository= az acr list --resource-group $(commonResourceGroupName) --query [].name --output tsv
Write-Output "##vso[task.setvariable variable=repository]$repository"

$cluster = az aks list --resource-group $(resourceGroupName) --query [].name --output tsv
Write-Output "##vso[task.setvariable variable=cluster]$cluster"

$webSiteName= az webapp list --resource-group $(resourceGroupName) --query [].name --output tsv
Write-Output "##vso[task.setvariable variable=webSiteName]$webSiteName"

# Write your powershell commands here.

Write-Host "Hello World"

# Use the environment variables input below to pass secret variables to this script.

environments.triggerReason: After successful deployment of Dev Infra

environments.name: Dev Mobile

inputs.script:
az login --service-principal --username $(servicePrincipal) --password $(clientSecret) --tenant $(tenatId) --output $(output)
az account set --subscription $(subscriptionid)

$webSiteName= az webapp list --resource-group $(resourceGroupName) --query [].name --output tsv
Write-Output "##vso[task.setvariable variable=webSiteName]$webSiteName"

# Read the version from the file passed in by build
$version = Get-Content .\version.txt -Raw
$version = $version.Trim()


$(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/artifact/iac/ber.ps1 -berUrl $(berUrl) -appName $(appName) -dataType $(dataType) -version $version -value 'http://$(webSiteName).azurewebsites.net' -verbose


$(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/artifact/iac/ber.ps1 -berUrl $(berUrl) -appName $(appName) -dataType Env -version $version -value 'Dev' -verbose

environments.triggerReason: After successful deployment of Dev Database,Dev Web Service,Dev BER

environments.name: Dev Testing
environments.triggerReason: After successful deployment of Dev Mobile,Dev K8s
